title: Create a Monthly Content Performance Report
description: A content marketer needs to report on the performance of the company blog from the last month.

tasks.description: In Google Analytics, filter for traffic to the '/blog/' section of the website for the last month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent isolates the data for the blog.

tasks.description: Identify the top 5 most-viewed blog posts for the month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of the top-performing content.

tasks.description: Report on key metrics for the blog as a whole, such as total users, average time on page, and top traffic sources.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a summary report of the blog's overall performance.
